H0.text: A solution is what forms when one substance dissolves in another.

H1.text: A transition forms when one substance dissolves in another.

H2.text: Concentrate forms when one substance dissolves in another.

H3.text: Complex is the product that forms when one substance dissolves in another.

A4.text: Hydrogen dissolves rather well in metals, especially in palladium

A5.text: Steel, basically a solution of carbon atoms in a crystalline matrix of iron atoms
